categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens actors

nodes.text: Francesca Longrigg (born 1961) is an English actress and musician who played a Bar Patron in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. She is best known for her small but distinct roles in television and film, such as Mrs. Domandy, Kenneth Branagh's nervous wife in the 2009 British comedy film The Boat That Rocked, retitled Pirate Radio in North America.
